task_history.full_task:
User mode feature is complete ✓ (7 phases, 22 files, comprehensive docs). Git clean. Now delegate to **quality_assurer** to test the full implementation:

• Run `npm run db:migrate` → verify schema changes applied
• Chrome DevTools: test each role (user, user_plus, dev, admin) - switch roles via DB update, refresh, verify UI gating (Console nav, New App button) and message filtering
• Verify friendly logs appear for user/user_plus (no terminal output leaking)
• Test assignment API: POST/GET/PATCH/DELETE endpoints with curl
• Confirm zero console errors, correct app visibility per role

If issues found → **error_fixer**. If clean → push commit, prepare deploy instructions.
